name: Shape Shifter (itch) (Arcehowl)
description:
Ludum Dare submission page

In this game, you play as a lone survivor of a tragic, catastrophic incident. As numerous hostile creatures appears from the underground, it looks like all hope is lost. But never fear! Using the twin blades that you've been carrying since you were born, you can shift the flow of energy inside you to vanquish these vile beasts!

Controls: X, C, V
